name: Oaks Pacific Blue Resort Salamander Bay

reviews.text: The property is beautifully designed with its lagoon swim-up rooms and Port Stephens is an absolutely stunning part of the North Coast barely two hours' drive from Sydney. This hotel also has a good restaurant on-site with professional, proactive, friendly and helpful staff but that's where my priases stop.

reviews.text: Upon presenting ourselves at Reception at 12:30 pm, unfriendly receptionist defensively pointed out that our reservation confirmation clearly states check-in is 2:00 pm. We didn't even ask to be checked in early!
reviews.title: Fantastic!!! ...Loved it
vey bad experience
reviews.text: I have to say that we were given our room allocations shortly after 2 pm but a request for extra pillows resulted in extra pillow cases being delivered to our room. When my request was repeated to the supervisor, I was told that I would have to make do with whatever bedding that was in my room due to the individual ownership structure of each room and the supervisor does not have access to a store of extra bedding items. After a long conversation (during which I had to question the supervisor's willingness to provide service to guests), he reluctantly agreed to give us the extra pillows from unoccupied rooms. I have stayed at countless properties ranging from roadside motels to 6-star properties and I never had so much trouble getting a couple of extra pillows! Not even during an enforced stay at a public hospital!

I also observed signs of poor maintenance in this two-month-old property. In our room, one bedside lamp was missing and there was a 2cm burnt hole in our doona which was cleverly covered up by placing a sheet over the doona instead of under the doona!
reviews.title: Ok but too far off the main thro' route to Syndey

aka: Oaks Pacific Blue Resort Salamander Bay Hotel Port Stephens
description: Located approximately two and a half hours north of Sydney and ideally situated to enjoy everything that beautiful Port Stephens has to offer, is the stunning Oaks Pacific Blue Resort. Oaks Pacific Blue Resort offers a choice of contemporary accommodation which includes studio, one and two bedroom apartments - some with swim-outs, along with spacious two and three bedroom townhouses with private plunge pools. For couples or singles you may prefer a premium hotel room.
